instructions:
Mix cocoa and sugar in a 2 quart saucepan; blend in 1 cup of the evaporated milk and the corn syrup. Add
cornstarch to remaining 1/4 cup of milk, mix well, and stir into mixture. Cook over medium-low heat stirring
constantly, until mixture boils; boil and stir 1 minute. Remove from heat and stir in butter and vanilla. Add
marshmallow creme and stir until blended. Makes about 2 1/2 cups. Serve warm over ice cream.
name: Hot Fudge Sauce
creator: Jim Decker
